title: Unconditional Shame
description: Rodney Chang, the opportunistic albatross around Hui Fong's neck, is a complication in Mr. Fong's life. Both men are adored by Mr. Fong's na√Øve and beautiful daughter, Kay Ling, who eventually has revelations of her own.Through persistence, Tavon Perry, Mr. Fong's Chief of Security, brings about an unwelcome a diamond theft within the company. During the course of the investigation, secrets are revealed, people are murdered, and lives are altered forever.The journey begins in China, and ends in America. Human nature unfolds and raw spirit is exposed.
author: Lee Ashe
